did.unittitle: Tufts School of Dental Medicine Student Handbook

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into one series.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This collection includes the School of Dental Medicine Student Handbook. It contains general information relevant to students of the Dental School regarding student affairs, ethics, academic affairs, student activities, and Tufts policies.

bioghist.head: Biographical / Historical
bioghist.p: Tufts University School of Dental Medicine was established in 1868 as Boston Dental College. It was incorporated into Tufts College in 1899. Although founded as a school to educate students from New England, today Tufts is renowned throughout the United States and the world as a center for academic and clinical excellence. Tufts boasts over 6,900 alumni composed of individuals from all fifty states and thirty-nine countries. The majority of the alumni outside of the USA have completed an Advanced Education Certificate program. Students receive a comprehensive education emphasizing the importance of didactic coursework, clinical experience, and practice management that prepares them to enter the work force as confident, proficient clinicians.

processinfo.head: Processing status
processinfo.p: This collection is processed and open for research

did.unittitle: Tufts School of Dental Medicine Student Handbook

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: This series includes the School of Dental Medicine Student Handbook. It contains general information relevant to students of the Dental School regarding student affairs, ethics, academic affairs, student activities, and Tufts policies.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is arranged largely chronologically.
